title: Software Developer (Next.js | React Native)
job_overview:
***PLEASE READ ON HOW TO APPLY***

Job Title: Software Developer
Location: Remote
Working Hours: UK
Salary Range: Php 180,000 per month
A MUST: Minimum of 8 years of solid experience

Job Specification: We’re looking for talented Software Developers to join our remote-first team. In this role, you’ll be responsible for building and maintaining responsive, high-performing full-stack web applications using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase - as well as developing cross-platform mobile applications using React Native.
Our ideal candidate writes clean, maintainable code, takes ownership of their work, and thrives in a fast-paced startup environment where autonomy, communication, and craftsmanship are valued.

Key Responsibilities
Build and maintain full-stack web applications using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase.
Develop and deploy mobile applications using React Native for both iOS and Android.
Implement responsive UI designs and efficient backend logic.
Integrate and maintain third-party APIs.
Collaborate asynchronously with a remote team across different time zones.
Participate in code reviews, share knowledge, and continuously improve engineering practices.
Write testable, well-documented, and scalable code for both web and mobile platforms.

Required Skills
Strong proficiency in TypeScript, React, and Next.js.
Experience with React Native and mobile development tools (e.g., Expo, Xcode, Android Studio).
Deep understanding of Tailwind CSS and responsive design principles.
Experience working with Supabase and relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL).
Ability to read and integrate third-party API documentation.
Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, version control (Git), and modern development workflows.
Ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and communicate clearly in a remote environment.
Solid problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

***PLEASE READ ON HOW TO APPLY***

How to Apply:
To apply for this role, please submit a link to your resume and a brief Loom video (max 2 minutes) introducing yourself and highlighting your skills relevant to the role. In your video, please address the following:
A short introduction of yourself and why you're interested in this role.
Your previous experience as a Full Stack Developer and specific experience with Next JS/Supabase
Key skills or qualifications that make you a strong fit for this position.

Please note: Applications without a video will not be reviewed. We look forward to welcoming a passionate developer who prioritizes clean code, performance optimization, and delivering exceptional user experiences.
